description:
Section 73 application to vary condition 2 (Drawing and Document Numbers), remove condition 4 (Level 5 balustrades) and vary condition 6 (Plant equipment Timer) of planning application reference P2018/2024/FUL, Dated:12/06/2019 for 

"Change of use of third floor and erection of fourth floor and fifth floor extensions to provide B1(a) office space. Alterations and improvements to the fenestration on the Tabernacle Street and Epworth Street elevations. Provision of cycle parking at lower ground floor, plant at roof level and associated changes and associated alterations".  

Amendments sought include updated drawings with design changes proposed to the layout of the rooftop plant enclosure,  the removal of condition 4 as balustrade will not be visible above the mansard roof and omit the hours of restriction for the plant and replace with wording that controls the overall noise level.
decision_conditions:
DRAWING AND DOCUMENT NUMBERS:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

Drawings and documents approved under P2018/2024/FUL:
Dwg 245-DS-01 PL1; Dwg 245-DS-02 PL1; Dwg 245-EE-01 PL1; Dwg 245-EE-02 PL1; Dwg 245-ES-01 PL1; Dwg 245-ES-02 PL1; Dwg 245-ES-03 PL1; Dwg 245-ES-04 PL1; Dwg 245-EX-09 PL1; Dwg 245-EX-10 PL1; Dwg 245-EX-11; Dwg 245-EX12; Dwg 245-EX13 PL1; Dwg 245-EX14 PL1; Dwg 245-EX-15 PL1; Dwg 245-GA-09 PL4; Dwg 245-GA-10 PL3; Dwg 245-GA-13 PL3; Dwg 245-GA-14 PL3; Dwg 245-GA-15 PL3; Dwg 245-GA-16  PL1; Dwg 245-GE-01 PL1; Dwg 245-GE-02 PL1; Dwg 245-GS- 01 PL1; Dwg 245-GS-02 PL1; Dwg 245-GS-03 PL1; Dwg 245-GS-04 PL1; Dwg 245-SP-01 PL1; Dwg 245-SP-02 PL1; Noise Report 01/06/2018; Daylight & Sunlight Assessment04/05/2018; Sustainable Design & Construction Statement Rev 1.1; Planning and Heritage Statement June 2018;  Transport Statement May 2018 & Design & Access Statement May 2018.

Drawings and documents approved under this application:
Dwg 245-GS-01 PL4; Dwg 245-GA-16 PL4; Dwg 245-GS-02 PL4; Dwg 245-GE-02 PL4; Dwg 245-GS-03 PL4; Dwg 245-GS-04 PL4; Dwg 245-SP-02 PL2; Dwg 245-DS-02 PL2; Dwg 245-DS-01 PL2; Dwg 245-GE-01 PL4; Planning Compliance Review Report 19792.PCR.01 Rev B; Design Statement January 2020

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
